header.name: Joan
header.description: Hello! I'm Joansiitoh, I've been programming for about 5 years on Minecraft and other projects for Linux!

projects.title: ufw_manager_gui
projects.description: UFW GUI Manager is a Python application that allows you to manage UFW (Uncomplicated Firewall) ports on a remote machine via SSH. The application features a simple and user-friendly graphical interface. I'm new to this so don't kill me either.

projects.title: edge_profile_manager
projects.description: Edge Profile Manager is a Python application that allows you to access Microsoft Edge profiles through a simple and friendly user interface.
